We are looking an experienced energetic and dynamic designer for Knit Garments in Design and merchandising team. Designer is responsible for developing knitwear designs aligned with buyer requirements, market trends, costing targets, and production feasibility. The role acts as a bridge between design, merchandising, sampling, and production to ensure timely and commercially viable knit garment development. Key Responsibilities: Develop knit garment designs as per buyer briefs, seasonal trends, and brand guidelines Create design concepts, mood boards, color stories, and fabric selections Prepare detailed tech packs including measurements, construction details, trims, and embellishments Coordinate with sampling teams to ensure accurate sample development Review fit, construction, and aesthetics of samples and suggest improvements Work closely with merchandising teams to align designs with costing and delivery timelines Assist in product range planning and line development for buyers Ensure designs meet target price points without compromising quality or aesthetics Support buyer presentations, design meetings, and approvals Select appropriate knit fabrics (single jersey, interlock, rib, fleece, etc.) Coordinate with fabric and trim sourcing teams for new developments Ensure fabric performance, shrinkage, GSM, and color fastness meet buyer standards Communicate clearly with production teams regarding design intent and construction details Address design-related issues during bulk production Ensure final garments match approved samples and specifications Research global knitwear trends, silhouettes, colors, and fabric innovations Analyze competitor products and buyer preferences Incorporate trend insights into commercially viable designs Skills & Exp

Support Buyer and Supplier to take more initiative to solve the problem by sharing information with team leader. job_title: Head of Sales & Marketing (Trade & Corporate Sales)
job_description: Head of Sales & Marketing (Trade & Corporate Sales) : B&T CABLES LTD. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List B&T CABLES LTD. Head of Sales & Marketing (Trade & Corporate Sales) Application Deadline : 24 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: At most 40 years Location: Dhaka (Banani) Salary: Negotiable Published: 25 Jan 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At most 40 years Minimum 15 years of professional experience in sales and marketing leadership roles. Proficiency in MS Word, MS Excel, and MS PowerPoint. Proven experience in electric cables, electrical products, or building materials industry. Strong exposure to both trade sales channels and corporate / project sales. Excellent negotiation, communication, and stakeholder management skills. Ability to lead large teams and drive performance across regions. Responsibilities & Context Develop and execute overall sales and marketing strategy aligned with company vision and industry practices. Prepare and implement periodical sales and marketing plans to achieve revenue and market share targets. Lead nationwide trade sales operations through distributors, dealers, and retail networks. Strengthen distribution coverage, dealer productivity, and long-term channel loyalty. Design, implement, and control trade policies, incentives, discount structures, and market activation programs. Ensure effective price discipline, stock movement, and collection control across trade channels. Drive corporate and project sales to EPC contractors, developers, consultants, utilities, government, and institutional clients. Oversee bidding, negotiation, contract finalization, and execution of large corporate and infrastructure projects. Build and maintain long-term relationships with key corporate clients, consultants, and influencers. Ensure coordination with production, supply chain, and technical teams for timely delivery and support. Align marketing and brand communication initiatives with trade and corporate sales objectives. Guide product positioning, value propositions, go-to-market strategies, and product launches. Monitor competitor activity, pricing, promotions, and overall market trends. Recommend pricing strategies balancing competitiveness and profitability. Approve credit limits, payment terms, and manage commercial risk within company policy. Monitor sales budgets, forecasts, contribution margins, and working capital performance. Lead, mentor, and develop regional, corporate, and marketing teams with clear KPIs and accountability. Prepare and present regular sales and marketing performance reports to top management. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Consumer Durables - Sales & Marketing Marketing Sales & Marketing Com

Executive (Product Design & Development) - Narrow Fabrics Application Deadline : 24 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Age: 25 to 35 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Tk. 32000 - 37000 (Monthly) Published: 25 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 25 to 35 years In-depth technical knowledge of elastic and narrow fabric development. Familiarity with Jacquard, Crochet, Needle Loom, and related narrow fabric machines. Strong documentation and specification development skills. Ability to interpret buyer requirements and translate them into technical products. Good communication and coordination skills with internal teams and buyers. Strong problem-solving ability and attention to detail. Responsibilities & Context Job Purpose The Executive – Product Design & Development (PDD) is responsible for the design, development, and approval of elastic products within the Narrow Fabric Section. The role ensures that all developments meet buyer requirements, technical specifications, and quality standards before bulk production. Key Responsibilities Receive and review development orders from buyers or internal merchandising teams. Develop elastic products using various narrow fabric techniques and machines, including: Jacquard Crochet Needle Loom Drawstring Bow Collar & Cuff and other narrow fabric items Develop and finalize yarn, rubber, and other raw material specifications as per buyer requirements. Prepare and maintain all required development documents, technical sheets, and approval records. Coordinate with sampling, production, and quality teams to ensure accurate product development. Develop elastic samples and submit them to buyers for approval within the required timeline. Communicate with buyers regarding technical details, modifications, and development feedback. Ensure buyer approvals are obtained before releasing products for bulk production. Provide final technical approval and handover to production for bulk manufacturing. Monitor development timelines to ensure on-time delivery of samples and approvals. Ensure compliance with company standards, buyer guidelines, and quality requirements. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 28 to 45 years Responsibilities & Context Plan, monitor, and control inventory of construction materials, tools, and equipment across project sites and central stores. Ensure optimum stock levels to avoid shortages, excess inventory, or material obsolescence. Forecast material requirements based on project schedules and consumption patterns. Coordinate with project teams for timely material availability. Supervise day-to-day operations of central and site stores. Ensure proper receipt, storage, identification, handling, and issuance of materials. Implement FIFO/LIFO practices where applicable. Ensure proper stacking, preservation, and protection of materials to prevent damage or loss. Verify incoming materials against purchase orders, delivery challans, and inspection reports. Coordinate with QA/QC for material inspection and approval before issuance. Ensure accurate and timely issue of materials as per approved indents. Monitor material returns, transfers, and surplus handling between sites. Maintain accurate inventory records in ERP/software and physical registers. Ensure timely updating of GRNs, issue slips, stock ledgers, and transfer notes. Conduct periodic stock reconciliation between physical and system records. Investigate and report discrepancies, shortages, or damages. Coordinate with procurement for timely purchase and delivery of materials. Share consumption data, lead times, and reorder levels with procurement teams. Support vendor performance monitoring related to material supply. Liaise with project teams to align inventory planning with construction progress. Supervise storekeepers, inventory executives, and support staff. Train staff on inventory procedures, ERP usage, and best practices. Prepare and submit inventory MIS reports (stock status, consumption, aging, shortages). Provide inventory-related data to management for decision-making. Highlight risks related to material availability and project timelines. Skills & Expertise Analytical Skill Construction engineering ERP/SAP Software Good communication and coordination skills Inventory Management Compensation & Other Benefits Provident fund,Gratuity,Mobile bill Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 3 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Ful

Production Manager Application Deadline : 24 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 02 Age: 30 to 45 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Negotiable Published: 25 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 30 to 45 years Responsibilities & Context Must check the daily production plan and give proper instructions to the concerned production team to work according to the plan. Must monitor the production every hour and sign the report. If any problem arises in the line for the production target or if the target is not met, it should be resolved quickly by discussing with the I.E Officer/In-Charge. If the problem cannot be resolved, then the Honorable Deputy General Manager should be informed to take necessary steps. Whether all types of trims/accessories are sufficient for the input and the relevant garment style in the line, if not, then the Honorable Deputy General Manager should be informed. Must meet the daily target and if the target is not met for any operation, importance should be given there. Check if there is any WIP/bottleneck in the line and keep the production speed at a tolerable level. If any defective garments are found in any process and quality table in the line, then they should be corrected immediately. If any machine breaks down during production, then the line mechanic should be informed immediately and if necessary, the machine should be changed. If anyone has any complaint on the line during production or if your associates do not work as per your instructions, then the matter should be reported to the Honorable Deputy General Manager for resolution and if he fails to resolve it, then the matter should be reported in writing to the Honorable Director. Work according to the production plan and prepare for the next style. Check with the store whether there is the necessary material for the next garment style and contact the cutting to collect samples for the next style. Arrange with the mechanic in charge whether the machine guide, folder and special machine are required for the next style. If any additional operator/helper is required, then inform the human resources department. Contact the washing section to know if there are washing instructions. Contact the finishing section daily and find out if there is any problem in your work, if any, then solve it quickly. job_description: জুনিয়র ওয়ার্ড মাস্টার (পুরুষ) : Dr. Fazlul Haque Colorectal Hospital Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Dr. Fazlul Haque Colorectal Hospital Limited জুনিয়র ওয়ার্ড মাস্টার (পুরুষ) Application Deadline : 24 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 18 to 32 years Location: Dhaka (Dhanmondi) Salary: Negotiable Published: 25 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 18 to 32 years Responsibilities & Context হাসপাতালের ওয়ার্ড বয়, আয়া ও ক্লিনারদের রোস্টার তৈরী করতে হবে। হসপিটালের সকল ওয়ার্ড , ফ্লোর, কেবিন ও অন্যান্য ময়লা স্থান পরিষ্কার- পরিছন্নতা নিশ্চিত করতে হবে। হাসপাতালের সকল মেডিকেল যন্ত্রপাতি সরঞ্জাম রক্ষনাবেক্ষন ও দায়িত্বসহকারে রাখা। হাসপাতালের সকল মেডিকেল যন্ত্রপাতি পর্যবেক্ষণের, মেরামত এবং রক্ষণাবেক্ষণের প্রয়োজন হয় তখন সংশ্লিষ্ট ব্যাক্তিকে জানানো এবং সার্বিক খেয়াল রাখা। আপনার উপর আপরকৃত সকল কর্মিদের হসপিটাল থেকে সরবরাহকৃত ড্রেস, জুতা, নেমপ্লেট ও অন্যান্য বিষয়ের উপর নজরদারী রাখা । কর্তৃপক্ষের নির্দেশানুযায়ী অন্যান্য কাজ সম্পাদন করা ও ক্লিনিং বিভাগের যাবতীয় কাজ দায়িত্বশীলতা ও জবাবদিহীতার সাথে সম্পন্ন করা। Skills & Expertise Suggested by Cleaning Maintenance Medical Equipment Ward Master Ward Nursing Compensation & Other Benefits বেতন পর্যালোচনা: (বার্ষিক) উৎসব ভাতা: ২টি (বার্ষিক) কোম্পানির নিয়ম অনুযায়ী অন্যান্য সুবিধা সমূহ। Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Job Location Dhaka (Dhanmondi) Company Information Dr. Fazlul Haque Colorectal Hospital Limited Follow Address: 726/A (Old), 86 (New), Satmasjid Road, Dhanmondi, Dhaka -1209 Business: Dedicated to Colorectal Surgery. QC Lead / In-Charge : Toa Feed Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Toa Feed Limited QC Lead / In-Charge Application Deadline : 24 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 2 Age: 28 to 45 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Negotiable Published: 25 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 28 to 45 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Agro based firms (incl. Poultry, Feed) Cattle Feeds Laboratory testing Poultry Feeds Quality assurance and control Quality Management. Strong Technical Know-How. Good at Microsoft Excel. Ability to work under pressure. Goal Oriented, Team Player and Proactive. Candidate must have experience in poultry industry and willingness to work anywhere in Bangladesh. Responsibilities & Context RM & Feed Quality Assurance: Develop and implement SOP for sampling and analysis of feed & raw materials. Daily review of variation between actual lab results of all RM and feeds. Initiate action for result variation. Ensure better quality and productivity. Ensure RM inspection carried out as per plan in ERP. Ensure Equipment Calibration as per schedule. Train and develop team members. Medicine & Premix Quality Assurance: Overall responsible for Medicine stock and weekly audit. Ensure premix dosage and mixing. Review batch records, chemist logs, and stock reconciliation reports. Production: Follow standard formulation and ensure zero variation. Review all of activities of production. Check and verify all record which QC following in production area. Hygiene: Follow-up chemist and encourage to be hygiene in feed mill area. Lab Inventory Management: Co-ordinate monthly stock audit Physical vs ERP Ensure the cost of Lab Expenses within the Budget. Packaging & Dispatch: Ensure the Finished Good Quality during Packing. Ensure the Chemical test before Dispatch. Reporting & Record Maintenance: Provide reports to HOD regarding RM, FG, and Bio-Security. Prepare weekly analytical report on Breeder Feeds & Raw Materials. Customer Complain Management: Receive Quality Complaints and solve along discussion with HOD. Ensure market sample checking. People Management: Developing the next level potentials to take up higher responsibilities. Ensure Potential Team Member Retention by Motivation, Reward and Recognition. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Garments Quality Control Audit/ Inspect Textiles & Garments Maintaining Compensation & Other Benefits Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus, Mobile bill, TA & DA Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Anywhere in Bangladesh Apply Procedure Email Your CV Send your CV to the given email toafeedltd@gmail.com Company Information Toa Feed Limited Follow Address: House No: 8 (1st Floor) Road

The 3D Designer – Knit Garments (Merchandising) is responsible for creating accurate, high-quality 3D garment simulations for knitwear that support merchandising, sampling reduction, and faster decision-making. This role bridges design, merchandising, and production by translating concepts, technical data, and buyer requirements into realistic 3D knit garment visuals aligned with cost, fit, and manufacturability. Support range building, line planning, and collection presentations using 3D assets. Create multiple colorways and variations quickly for buyer selection. Assist in visualizing cost-effective design alternatives without physical sampling. Interpret tech packs, measurement specs, knit programs, and yarn details accurately in 3D. Work with pattern makers and technicians to ensure virtual garments meet fit and construction standards. Update 3D files based on fit

job_description: Deputy Manager/ Asst. Manager - Quality Assurance : BIOCURE PHARMACEUTICAL Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List BIOCURE PHARMACEUTICAL Deputy Manager/ Asst. Manager - Quality Assurance Application Deadline : 24 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Narsingdi Published: 25 Jan 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Other qualification: 2-4 years working experience in Quality Assurance in a managerial position Excellent written/oral communication skills, computer knowledge Knowledge of GLP, GMP & ISO 9001. Ability to work independently with minimal supervision. Responsibilities & Context Biocure Pharmaceuticals is fast growing hi-tech life-saving medicine and other devices manufacturer and supplier in Bangladesh & abroad. We have already steeped in many countries of Asia, Africa and Latin American countries; with our hi-tech health care support. Biocure Innovation is a revolutionary leader in the pharmaceutical sector, collaborating with GMP-compliant generic manufacturers in India and Bangladesh to deliver a diverse range of high-quality generic pharmaceutical products worldwide. Our mission is to serve as a 'One-Stop Solution' for global healthcare organizations, ensuring seamless access to essential medicines across the globe. Our progress is driven by strategic planning, innovation and research expansion. We need the service of qualified person who can independently run Quality Assurance department. Job Responsibilities: To prepare all QA related and other concern SOPs and documents according to GMP. To perform all IPC related test and activities of tablet, capsule and ointment products To sample and collection of all kind of bulk item (s), Retention sample and Finished Product (s) and entry in the respective Log Book. Handle Change control, Deviation, CAPA, self-inspection, internal audit, market complain, etc. To check the Batch Manufacturing Record (BMR) & Batch Packaging Records (BPR) before production. To Check and compiled Batch History before Finished Product Release. Perform all qualification and validation related activities Handle all quality risk management (QRM) and quality management system (QMS) related activities. Perform Toll manufacturing Activities Perform APQR Annual product Quality review. Experience in implementing quality control measures and ensuring compliance with industry standards. Proven ability to lead teams and drive continuous process improvements. Effective communication and problem-solving skills to collaborate across departments. Familiarity with textile industries and a solid understanding of menswear and kidswear production. KL DESIGN offers extensive in-house production facilities to manage the entire production process efficiently. To learn more about the company’s capabilities. Role Description: We are seeking a HEAD OF QUALITY DEPARTMENT - Planning, Production, and Quality for a full-time, on-site role in Dhaka, Bangladesh. The role involves overseeing the planning and production processes to ensure timely and efficient delivery. The manager will implement and monitor quality control systems, collaborate cross-functionally to meet production goals, and ensure compliance with industry standards. Additional responsibilities include providing leadership to the production team and identifying continuous improvement opportunities to optimize workflows and product quality. Ensure that every beneficiary receives an adequate medical examination, appropriate diagnosis, treatment and referral for additional treatment following the national/UNICEF WHO CMAM protocol/guideline and standard guidelines. Conduct medical examination to targeted beneficiaries, which includes vital signs, physical examination and medical history. Prescribe routine medications and provide treatment according to standard CMAM guidelines and treatment protocols. Follow CMAM protocols in assessing, admitting and treating beneficiaries in the CMAM (OTP/TSFP) program. Timely referral of children with severe acute malnutrition (SAM) with medical complications to the Nearby stabilization Centre (SC). To ensure that any beneficiary requiring further medical assistance is referred to the nearest health facility in accordance with protocols. Correctly record all relevant information (symptoms, diagnosis, measurements, treatment plan) for each beneficiary on the appropriate forms of beneficiaries and medication given and complete the child's card (CMC) at every visit. Keep an up-to-date record of all therapeutic feeding products requisitions, consumptions, medication used and be responsible for stock management and reporting (distribution monitoring, use of non-expired drugs, stock ordering, balance stock, etc.). Ensure wastes (medical and non-medical) are adequately disposed of at the facility. Provide health education and counselling to all caretakers

Under the overall supervision of the FAO Representative in Bangladesh, the direct supervision of the Assistant FAO Representative (Programme), and in close consultation with project and programme staff, the incumbent will work closely with the National Programme Specialist of FAO, project teams, relevant government institutions, and other stakeholders. Technical Focus The position focuses on providing operational, financial, and administrative support for the effective implementation of national, global and regional FAO projects and programmes under Technical Cooperation Programme (TCP), Trust Fund (TF) and Regular Programme (RP) budgets. The incumbent will ensure accurate processing of financial transactions, vendor management, and budget monitoring in line with FAO rules. The role also emphasizes coordination of meetings, workshops, trainings, and travel arrangements, as well as maintaining up-to-date project records and Field Programme Management Information System (FPMIS) documentation. Strong liaison with stakeholders and government agencies is essential to facilitate smooth project delivery and reporting. Tasks and responsibilities Assist in the formulation of project documents, concept notes, and proposals, and support the formulation of projects in line with FAO procedures and policies. Support the implementation and management of national, regional and global FAO projects by: (1) Preparing and monitoring budgets, reviewing transactions, providing expenditure updates and mediating erroneous transactions, and preparing related financial documentation; and (2) Managing daily project operations, including activity budgets, settlements and administrative processes such as CA, EFT, PRs, technical evaluations, pro-formas, work/travel-plans and Note Verbale/Notes for File—resolving operational issues during implementation. Responsibilities & Context Job Context We are looking for a IE AGM- Operation in M&N Garments factory, responsible for overseeing the Industrial Engineering activities for the Woven Sections. The AGM Operation will develop and implement production plans and schedules, manage staff, and monitor production Input & output, SMB Calculation, Overall Costing Follow up. Job Responsibilities Analyze the line-wise productions, line balancing, workers` individual efficiency, production efficiency. Have the knowledge to follow up on the total production system from cutting to finishing. Develop and adopt new techniques and methodologies to increase productivity and quality with minimum cost. Ensure optimum utilization of the skills of the workers, and machine, to minimize the cost. Plan layout of machines and lines to get highest productivity. Identify and remove causes of delay in production to meet shipment dates. Monitor line wise production report, on hourly output basis. Daily manpower balancing, target setting and achievement monitoring. Check all IE related reports (time/method /motion/capacity study report of the floor on the basis of individual buyer). Recommend new ideas and methods for increasing productivity and improving quality. Last but not the least present 2 concise copies of, daily production performance, upcoming weekly target & planning and monthly production forecast. One of each for MD and Director.
